name: Empty Jar Drill Press
description:
Description:

A game prototype made by students during the 2021-22 school year over a two week period. In Empty Jar Drill Press, you control up to three different characters, each with their own abilities, switching between them to make your way to the goal. All characters much reach the goal, the titular empty-jar drill press, to advance to the next level.

Controls:

  • W A S D - Move around
  • Number keys (1, 2, 3) on keyboard to change to specific character
  • Q to switch to next character
  • R to restart the current level
  • Enter to pause game
  • Semi-colon (; key) to skip level

Characters:

  • Push - Strong jar that can push crates
  • Break - Working jar that can smash enemy purple jars
  • Small - Baby jar that can fit through tighter spaces

Creators:

  • Andrew K.
  • Evan A.
  • Gavin C.
  • Nate S.
